name: Color Run
description:
This project was created for the 2018 Preindie Game Jam.

Color Run  is a short platform  where the player attempts to go through different rooms with each room presenting something new or something the player already learn in a new way.

This project is the first time I used a visual scripting on a game project before. I used Bolt by Ludiq. I used Bolt along side of c# scripts in Monodeveloper.
